original: LINDMARK, Sven Albert, Johannes, Direktör, Göteborg, f Skara 17/10 96 av byggm A L o Nancy Carlsdotter, gm Signe Gahnström. Studex Skara 16, Holmqvists hdlsinst. Aff.-anst 17—18, vik tjm Skandinavbkn 19, korr Nord Industri AB 19, kont Specialmaskiner AB v ds start 20, kont.ch 22, vkst dir sed. 34, v. styr.ordf där sed. 28, huvudintressent. Ag bl a Källebergs gård Vgl. Styr.ordf o vkst dir Fastigh.AB Columbia. Upprep resor Balti-cum, Danm, Engl, Finl, Holl, Norge, Tjeckoslov, Tyskl 23—43. Hobby: Botanik. LINDMARK. Tore Gustaf Emanuel, Professor emeritus, Stockholm, f Sthlm 26/10 72 av komm C G L o Jenny Wahlberg, gm Anna Wennerström. Mog.ex Nya Elem.sk Sthlm 90, ex KTH (mask) 94. Anst dr G de Lavals experim.Iab 94—97, AB de Lavals Ångturbin 97—15, övering AB Vaporackumulator Sthlm 15—17, prof ångtekn KTH 17—39, pro-rekt 22 27, rekt 27—31. Styr.led stat provn.anst 19— 40, Vattenfallsstyr 28—42, led ktén f högre tekn undervisri ordn 30—32. Styr.led AB de Lavals Ångturbin 13—17, AB Vaporackumul 16—22. Av trycket bl a »Ångteknik» (Uppfinn bok 25), »Ångpannor» (De tekn vetensk 27), »The flame radiation in water-cooled boiler furnaces» (tills m Edenholm 27), »Study ön heat transmission in boiler furnaces» (29), medarb Nord Familjebok. KVOlkl, RNO; HedLIVA, v. preses 26—28 där, preses 29—31,
translated:
LINDMARK, Sven Albert, Johannes, Director, Gothenburg, b. Skara 17/10 96, son of builder A L and Nancy Carlsdotter, m. Signe Gahnström. Studied at Skara 16, completed commercial education at Holmqvists 17-18. Employed 17-18, assistant at Skandinavbkn 19, correspondent for Nord Industri AB 19, accountant at Specialmaskiner AB from the beginning of 20, head of accounting since 22, vice managing director since 34, vice chairman of the board since 28, main shareholder. Also involved in Källebergs gård Vgl. Chairman of the board and vice managing director of Fastigh.AB Columbia. Repeated trips to the Baltic countries, Denmark, England, Finland, the Netherlands, Norway, Czechoslovakia, Germany 23-43. Hobby: Botany.

LINDMARK, Tore Gustaf Emanuel, Professor Emeritus, Stockholm, b. Stockholm 26/10 72, son of C G L and Jenny Wahlberg, m. Anna Wennerström. Passed final exams at Nya Elem.sk Stockholm in 90, degree in engineering (mechanical) at KTH in 94. Employed at G de Lavals experim.Iab 94–97, AB de Lavals Ångturbin 97–15, chief engineer at AB Vaporackumulator Stockholm 15–17, professor of steam engineering at KTH 17–39, pro-rector 22-27, rector 27-31. Board member of the state testing institute 19–40, Vattenfall board member 28–42, member of the commission for higher technical education 30–32. Board member of AB de Lavals Ångturbin 13–17, AB Vaporackumul 16–22. Published works include "Ångteknik" (Uppfinn bok 25), "Ångpannor" (De tekn vetensk 27), "The flame radiation in water-cooled boiler furnaces" (in collaboration with Edenholm 27), "Study on heat transmission in boiler furnaces" (29), contributed to Nord Familjebok. Order of the Royal Western Crown, Royal North Star Order; Honorary Membership of the Swedish Society for Anthropology and Geography, vice president 26–28, president 29–31.
